title: Can't login in
body: After launching league client I can't go to login in screen I tried everything and still can't figure out where is the problem please someone help me .

replies.body: Give your PC a restart in case there's a hiccup in the background.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well to make sure your OS settings aren't blocking the patcher from launching.  I hope that helps!
